name: 保罗·威廉姆斯·多诺万
name_full: 保罗·威廉姆斯·多诺万 Paul Williams Donovan

last_movies.title: Bodyguards by Day, Lovers by Night

introduction: Paul Williams Donovan is an international actor who was born in Italy and raised in Scotland. In 2023, Paul graduated from the prestigious Bristol Old Vic Theatre School. Prior to his training, he worked on both sides of the Atlantic, appearing on screen as a recurring co-star in 'Abandonados' (RTP) and in 'Baan', which premiered at the Locarno Film Festival. On stage, he appeared as Mark Antony in 'Julius Caesar,' as Rothko in 'Red,' and as Bardolph in 'Henry V' at the Bristol Old Vic. He has worked as a fine art model, appeared in several commercials, and was featured in a series of radio ads for Subway. Paul has a BA in History from the University of California, Berkeley, and has also studied at the Demidov Studio in London and with Philippe Gaulier in France. Paul is a polyglot who fluently speaks German, Italian, Spanish, French and Portuguese.
